assertions.title: The assistive technology MUST convey the accessible name of the select
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know the purpose of the select.

assertions.title: The assistive technology MUST convey the select role
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know that the element has select behavior.

assertions.title: The assistive technology MUST convey the current value of the select
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know that the current value is.
